text: 242 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO POLICIES b. in exceptional circumstances, provide robust demonstration that the site is unsuitable for continued use in an employment use or an alternative Strategic CAZ function due to its condition, reasonable options for restoring the site to employment use or alternative Strategic CAZ functions are unviable, and that the benefits of the proposed development would outweigh the benefits of an employment use or other Strategic CAZ functions. 5. Development proposals in LMELs and non-designated locations that would result in a net loss of employment floorspace will be supported where it can be demonstrated that all reasonable efforts have been taken to preserve the space in employment use, including evidence of appropriate maintenance and upkeep and efforts to increase the flexibility of the space for employment uses, and:
